# Transmutation (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** strong transmutation; **CL** 13th

**Slot** none

**Price** 82,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

This staff is generally carved from or decorated with petrified wood or fossilized bone, each etched with tiny but complex runes. It allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Alter Self (Spell)|Alter self]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Blink (Spell)|Blink]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Expeditious Retreat (Spell)|Expeditious retreat]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Baleful Polymorph (Spell)|Baleful polymorph]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Polymorph (Spell)|Polymorph]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Disintegrate (Spell)|Disintegrate]]* (3 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Alter Self (Spell)|alter self]], [[Baleful Polymorph (Spell)|baleful polymorph]], [[Blink (Spell)|blink]], [[Disintegrate (Spell)|disintegrate]], [[Expeditious Retreat (Spell)|expeditious retreat]], [[Polymorph (Spell)|polymorph]]*

**Cost** 41,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 495
